translations: 表达，措辞；<文>躺下，躺卧；<古>平端（矛或枪）（准备攻击）；用下压及后压晶状体的方式治疗（白内障）；贴线缝绣

phrs.translation: 在沙发上；[美口]接受心理分析
成天躺著或坐在沙发上看电视的人；极为懒惰的人

sentences.sentence: Young graduates are in debt, out of work and on their parents' couches.
sentences.translation: 年轻的毕业生们负债累累，失业在家，只能靠父母接济。

sentences.sentence: He took the mulled cider, then sat on one of the couches, his heart still beating rapidly.
sentences.translation: 他拿了杯温热苹果酒，然后坐在一张长沙发上，他的心脏依旧跳得厉害。

sentences.sentence: Planning documents pledged that the great legacy of the Games would be to lever a nation of sport lovers away from their couches.
sentences.translation: 规划文件承诺，奥运会的伟大遗产将会是把一个国家的体育爱好者们撬离沙发。
